title: Uplift Radio – Micro Audio Explainers
goal: Curate 60-second explainers on coping strategies tailored to listener interests.
why_it_matters: Students prefer quick, relatable mental-wellness content.
workflow: User picks themes like “Exam Anxiety” or “Self-Esteem”.
Engine matches and queues audio explainers.
Tracks listens and suggests new ones weekly.
outcome: Demonstrates multimedia personalization with minimal compute cost.
